infotexts.loadingscreentip: The crook has learned to scavenge human environments for food. Most feed it monster corpses to keep it satisfied— otherwise, it might start eyeing humans as its next meal...
infotexts.entitydescription.crookfur: Can be used as a crafting material in a fabricator.
infotexts.entitydescription.crookcape: Crafted from the fur of a crook, this cape envelops its wearer in a subtle power of vaguely threatening persuasion, making mission-givers find themselves strangely inclined to offer better rewards.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.crookcape: Crafted from the fur of a crook, this cape envelops its wearer in a subtle power of vaguely threatening persuasion, making mission-givers find themselves strangely inclined to offer better rewards. It is slowly deteriorating.
infotexts.talentdescription.crookcapeinfluence: All mission mark rewards are increased by [amount]% as long as a crewmember is wearing the crook cape.
